questions.question: Which component is primarily responsible for drawing leading current in a transmission line?
What type of load condition is most likely to exhibit the Ferranti Effect?

explanations.a: Incorrect – heavy inductive loads cause voltage drop.
explanations.b: Incorrect – heavy capacitive loads can also cause voltage rise but Ferranti is specific to no-load.
explanations.c: Correct – the effect is prominent under no-load or light load conditions.
explanations.d: Incorrect – unity power factor load doesn't typically cause this effect.
